title: The Situation in Her Bed - Novel Updates
tags: Blackmail   C*nnilingus   Co-Workers   Enemies Become Lovers   Female Protagonist   Glasses-wearing Love Interests   Handsome Male Lead   Indecisive Protagonist   Jealousy   Love at First Sight   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Obsessive Love   Office Romance   Persistent Love Interests   Possessive Characters   Secret Crush   Secret Relationship   S*x Friends   Slow Romance
author: Chocolat   쇼콜라
description:
After getting dumped by her boyfriend of four years, Sunghee got drunk to forget him. But when she woke up the next morning, she saw the unfamiliar ceiling, unfamiliar bed, and… a man she didn’t recognize. 

And just like that, her whole life changed.>
